nodes.text: The Droid Abolitionist Movement was a fanatical group of individuals that promoted droid rights. Led by Xalto Sneerzick, the group petitioned that droids be freed from servitude and be granted the rights of all sentients. The movement reached its height when its members led an attack on Cosmohaul Shipping seeking to free its droids. The coalition collapsed, however, when the group of frightened droids killed the entire group.
